sen.j: 『書紀』用明天皇紀によると、用明天皇が敏達天皇14年（585年）9月5日 (旧暦)（新暦10月3日）に日本国の第31代天皇に即位すると、斎王として伊勢神宮に遣わされた。
sen.e: According to the Records of Emperor Yomei in Nihon Shoki, when Emperor Yomei ascended the throne and became the 31st Emperor of Japan in October 5, 585, she was dispatched to Ise Jingu Shrine as Saio (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines).

sen.j: なお『書紀』の分注には、用明天皇の崩御後も引き続き斎王を務め、推古天皇の時に退下して葛城の地で薨じたと伝えた。
sen.e: In the records of Nihonshoki, after the death of Emperor Yomei, she continuously served as Saio, and at the time of Empress Suiko, she resigned from the presence of the Empress and died in the land of Katsuraki.
